description: The ability to read files and list directories from the local file system.

success_rate.description: Percentage of file operations completed successfully.

efficiency_seconds.description: Average time to complete a file-read task.

training_history.event: Skill acquired during initial cognitive architecture setup.

description: The ability to condense large blocks of text into concise, coherent summaries, paying close attention to nuance and key points.

success_rate.description: Percentage of summarization tasks completed successfully.

coherence_score.description: Average linguistic coherence score of the summary.

training_history.event: Skill acquired during initial cognitive architecture setup.
